first_para: Mark Andrew Pritchard (born 22 November 1966) is a British Conservative politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for The Wrekin in Shropshire since the general election in 2005.

full.extract: Mark Andrew Pritchard (born 22 November 1966) is a British Conservative politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for The Wrekin in Shropshire since the general election in 2005.
full.title: Mark Pritchard (politician)
